RQL_QUERY: config from iam where dest.cloud.type = 'AWS' AND action.name IN ('ecr:SetRepositoryPolicy','serverlessrepo:PutApplicationPolicy','backup:PutBackupVaultAccessPolicy','elasticfilesystem:PutFileSystemPolicy','glacier:SetVaultAccessPolicy','secretsmanager:PutResourcePolicy','events:PutPermission','mediastore:PutContainerPolicy','glue:PutResourcePolicy','ses:PutIdentityPolicy','lambda:AddPermission','lambda:AddLayerVersionPermission','s3:PutBucketPolicy','s3:PutBucketAcl','s3:PutObject','s3:PutObjectAcl','kms:CreateGrant','kms:PutKeyPolicy','es:UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig','sns:AddPermission','sqs:AddPermission') AND source.cloud.service.name = 'ec2' AND source.cloud.resource.type = 'instance'
POLICY_NAME: AWS EC2 machine with write access permission to resource-based policies_CUSTOM
POLICY_DESCRIPTION: AWS EC2 machine with write access permission to resource-based policies_CUSTOM
SAVED_SEARCH_NAME: AWS EC2 machine with write access permission to resource-based policies_CUSTOM
SAVED_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: AWS EC2 machine with write access permission to resource-based policies_CUSTOM

RQL_QUERY: config from iam where source.cloud.type = 'AWS' AND grantedby.cloud.entity.type = 'role' AND dest.cloud.resource.type = 'role' AND action.name = 'sts:AssumeRole' AND dest.cloud.resource.isadministrative = true AND dest.cloud.account != source.cloud.account
POLICY_NAME: Service account can assume a service account with admin priv_CUSTOM
SAVED_SEARCH_NAME: Service account can assume a service account with admin priv_CUSTOM
SAVED_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Service account can assume a service account with admin priv_CUSTOM
